1.text: Run Pull up on TestCase.setUp (copies the method to Assert)  Go to 2nd page of wizard.

2.text: In tree of changes, under Assert, we get the  message "copy method 'void setUp()' to type 'TestCase'".

3.text: Shouldn't it be 'Copy  method 'void setUp()' FROM type 'TestCase'" (also with upper-case C in Copy).

4.text: Another thing: if I select to delete setUp from TestCase, I get under TestCase  the message "Delete method 'void setUp()' declared in  type 'junit.framework.TestCase'".

5.text: Here TestCase is shown with the fully  qualified name.

6.text: Shouldn't then the 'copy method' text be consistent and also  use the fully qualified name?
